title: Location
question: Do you know where it is, if so where?

title: Opening
question: Letâ€™s talk about why you are going, is that OK?

title: Nature
question: What would you like to discuss at your consultation? What is the problem?

title: Reason
question: What are the main issues you are experiencing?

title: History
question: When did you first notice these?

title: Effects
question: Does this have an impact on your life? If so how?

title: Medication
question: Can you check that your medication list up to date, including supplements?

title: Outcome
question: What would you like to get out of the consultation?

title: Additional Concerns
question: Is anything else worrying you at the moment? If so, what are they?
